{"id":1138581134,"question_id":3249,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5 months, 1 week","timestamp":1704553447,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1138581134/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Number of Operations to Make Array XOR Equal to K","memory":"61.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int minOperations(int[] nums, int k) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        int xor = 0;\n        \n        for(int n : nums){\n            xor ^= n;\n        }\n        \n        String s = Integer.toBinaryString(xor);\n        String t = Integer.toBinaryString(k);\n        \n        s = new StringBuilder(s).reverse().toString();\n        t = new StringBuilder(t).reverse().toString();\n        // System.out.println(s + \" \"  + t);\n        int cnt=0;\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<Math.max(s.length(), t.length()); i++){\n            \n            if(i<s.length() && i<t.length()){\n                \n                 // System.out.println(t.charAt(i) + \" \" + s.charAt(i)+ \" \" + i + \" \"+ cnt);\n                if(s.charAt(i)!=t.charAt(i)){\n                    cnt++;\n                }\n            }else if(i< s.length()){\n                if(s.charAt(i)=='1')\n                    cnt++;\n            }else if(i <t.length()){\n                if(t.charAt(i)=='1')\n                    cnt++;\n            }\n            \n           \n        }\n        \n        return cnt;\n        \n        \n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-number-of-operations-to-make-array-xor-equal-to-k","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
